title: Social Media Users Blast Spotify For Leaning Into AI For 2024 'Wrapped'
content: Social media users have lashed out at Spotify for leaning into AI and creating something that did not feel like 'Wrapped' of the previous years.
summary: Social media users have lashed out at Spotify for leaning into AI and creating something that did not feel like 'Wrapped' of the previous years.

title: Billionaires' Wealth More Than Doubles In 10 Years: Swiss Bank UBS
content: Billionaires have seen their combined wealth shoot up 121 percent over the past decade to $14 trillion, Swiss bank UBS said Thursday, with tech billionaires' coffers filling the fastest.
summary: Billionaires have seen their combined wealth shoot up 121 percent over the past decade to $14 trillion, Swiss bank UBS said Thursday, with tech billionaires' coffers filling the fastest.

title: US Judge Rejects Boeing 737 MAX Accord Over Diversity Policies
content: A US judge rejected a criminal settlement with Boeing over the 737 MAX crashes on Thursday, slamming diversity policies at the aviation giant and the Justice Department that made him "skeptical" of a fair outcome.
summary: A US judge rejected a criminal settlement with Boeing over the 737 MAX crashes on Thursday, slamming diversity policies at the aviation giant and the Justice Department that made him "skeptical" of a fair outcome.

title: Woman Who Snuck On New York To Paris Flight Charged As 'Stowaway'
content: A woman accused of evading airport identity and ticket checks and sneaking onto a flight from New York to Paris was charged Thursday with being a stowaway.
summary: A woman accused of evading airport identity and ticket checks and sneaking onto a flight from New York to Paris was charged Thursday with being a stowaway.

title: Syrian Rebels Capture Key City Of Hama As Army Withdraws
content: Islamist-led rebels captured the central Syrian city of Hama on Thursday in a new blow to President Bashar al-Assad's forces days after they lost the country's commercial hub Aleppo.
summary: Islamist-led rebels captured the central Syrian city of Hama on Thursday in a new blow to President Bashar al-Assad's forces days after they lost the country's commercial hub Aleppo.

title: Canada Bans Assault Weapons It Plans To Send To Ukraine
content: Canada on Thursday announced a ban on 324 models of assault weapons -- granting amnesty in order to collect them from gun shops -- with the aim of shipping them to Ukraine.
summary: Canada on Thursday announced a ban on 324 models of assault weapons -- granting amnesty in order to collect them from gun shops -- with the aim of shipping them to Ukraine.

title: Inscribed Bullet Shells, Photos Of UnitedHealthcare CEO's Killer Emerge
content: The New York Police Department released new photos that showed the face of the man wanted in connection with the fatal shooting of insurance chief Brian Thompson, as the search for his killer entered a second day.
summary: The New York Police Department released new photos that showed the face of the man wanted in connection with the fatal shooting of insurance chief Brian Thompson, as the search for his killer entered a second day.

title: Kash Patel, Donald Trump's FBI Pick, Is Qanon's 'Name To Remember'
content: Kash Patel, Donald Trump's pick for FBI director, has repeatedly engaged with QAnon -- the sprawling conspiracy theory that the top US law enforcement body currently says is linked to violent domestic extremism.
summary: Kash Patel, Donald Trump's pick for FBI director, has repeatedly engaged with QAnon -- the sprawling conspiracy theory that the top US law enforcement body currently says is linked to violent domestic extremism.

title: Arctic Could Witness First Ice-Free Day In 3 Years, Study Reveals
content: Arctic sea ice has been melting at an unprecedented rate of more than 12 per cent each decade, according to NASA.
summary: Arctic sea ice has been melting at an unprecedented rate of more than 12 per cent each decade, according to NASA.

title: Russia Says Ready To Defend Through "Any Means"
content: Russian Foreign Minister Sergey Lavrov on Thursday said he hopes the West took "seriously" Moscow's recent use of a hypersonic missile in Ukraine, and warned that Russia was ready to use "any means" to defend itself.
summary: Russian Foreign Minister Sergey Lavrov on Thursday said he hopes the West took "seriously" Moscow's recent use of a hypersonic missile in Ukraine, and warned that Russia was ready to use "any means" to defend itself.

title: NASA Delays Crewed Lunar Landing Until 2027 As Trump Prepares For Office
content: The United States is pushing back its planned return to the Moon from 2026 to "mid-2027" as it deals with heat shield issues and other troubles plaguing its Orion crew capsule, NASA officials said Thursday.
summary: The United States is pushing back its planned return to the Moon from 2026 to "mid-2027" as it deals with heat shield issues and other troubles plaguing its Orion crew capsule, NASA officials said Thursday.

title: Macron Says He Won't Resign, Vows To Name New PM In "Coming Days"
content: French President Emmanuel Macron Thursday vowed to name a new prime minister "in the coming days" after the resignation of Michel Barnier, whose government was toppled by a no-confidence vote in parliament.
summary: French President Emmanuel Macron Thursday vowed to name a new prime minister "in the coming days" after the resignation of Michel Barnier, whose government was toppled by a no-confidence vote in parliament.

title: Rise Of AI-Powered Tools Among Amazon Exec's Top 5 Predictions For 2025
content: A mission-driven workforce of tomorrow, energy efficiency driving innovation, and rise of AI-powered tools that accelerate fact-checking and debunk misinformation are among the top five tech predictions outlined by Amazon CTO Werner Vogels.
summary: A mission-driven workforce of tomorrow, energy efficiency driving innovation, and rise of AI-powered tools that accelerate fact-checking and debunk misinformation are among the top five tech predictions outlined by Amazon CTO Werner Vogels.

title: 7.0 Magnitude Earthquake Hits US' California, Tsunami Warning Issued
content: A powerful earthquake struck Thursday off the coast of California, sparking a tsunami warning, US seismologists said.
summary: A powerful earthquake struck Thursday off the coast of California, sparking a tsunami warning, US seismologists said.

title: "Contribution Unequal, Responsibility Must Be Too": India At Climate Hearing
content: India slammed developed countries for causing the climate crisis during a landmark hearing at the International Court of Justice (ICJ) on Thursday, saying they exploited the global carbon budget, failed to honour climate-finance promises.
summary: India slammed developed countries for causing the climate crisis during a landmark hearing at the International Court of Justice (ICJ) on Thursday, saying they exploited the global carbon budget, failed to honour climate-finance promises.

title: US H-1B Visa Quota Full For 2025. What Applicants Should Do Now
content: A congressional cap of 65,000 H-1B visas for regular applicants and an additional 20,000 visas for US advanced degree holders have been mandated by the US government.
summary: A congressional cap of 65,000 H-1B visas for regular applicants and an additional 20,000 visas for US advanced degree holders have been mandated by the US government.

title: ISRO Puts PROBA-3 In Orbit. A 10-Point Guide About The European Satellite
content: Indian space agency ISRO today successfully launched the European Space Agency's PROBA-3 satellite. The launch was on board ISRO's workhorse rocket - the Polar Satellite Launch Vehicle or PSLV in its 61st commercial mission 'C-59'.
summary: Indian space agency ISRO today successfully launched the European Space Agency's PROBA-3 satellite. The launch was on board ISRO's workhorse rocket - the Polar Satellite Launch Vehicle or PSLV in its 61st commercial mission 'C-59'.

title: Scientists Reveal Real Face Of Santa Claus After 1,700 Years. See Pics
content: Scientists have revealed the face of Saint Nicholas of Myra, the real-life bishop who inspired the concept of modern-day Santa Claus.
summary: Scientists have revealed the face of Saint Nicholas of Myra, the real-life bishop who inspired the concept of modern-day Santa Claus.

title: "Reflected On Lessons Learnt": India On Diplomatic Talks With China
content: To prevent recurrence of military standoff along their contested border, India and China on Thursday reflected on the lessons learnt from the eastern Ladakh face-off that ended a few weeks ago following completion of the disengagement process.
summary: To prevent recurrence of military standoff along their contested border, India and China on Thursday reflected on the lessons learnt from the eastern Ladakh face-off that ended a few weeks ago following completion of the disengagement process.

title: FBI Warns Texts Between Android, iPhone Could Be Hacked, Shares Safety Tips
content: FBI urged citizens to use encryption to secure their communications amid a massive Chinese cyberattack.
summary: FBI urged citizens to use encryption to secure their communications amid a massive Chinese cyberattack.
